author: brianp
msg: Move a potentially expensive pool cleanup operation outside

author: aaron
msg: Preserve the original error, or if the unlock fails then use that

author: aaron
msg: Modify the worker MPM to not accept() new connections until
there is an available worker thread. This prevents queued
connections from starving for processing time while long-running
connections were hogging all the available threads.
